project.name: Squelette Sarka-SPIP
project.description:
Sarka-SPIP is a SPIP template designed to fit with various usage. It allows all SPIP objects editing and implements some extra features as gallery, diary, sites' collection... The template ensures integration of the most popular SPIP plug-ins as crayons, accès restreint, SPIP-Listes, Thickbox, Boutons Texte...
In the coming release, configuration is eased by means of administration interface (plug-in CFG).

license.name: gpl3
